Movie.Title: Radio Free Albemuth
Movie.Writer: John Alan Simon (screenplay), Philip K. Dick (novel)
Movie.Actors: Shea Whigham, Jonathan Scarfe, Michael Rothhaar, Katheryn Winnick
Movie.Plot: Berkeley record store clerk Nick Brady (Jonathan Scarfe) begins to experience strange visions from an entity he calls VALIS that cause him to uproot his family and move to Los Angeles where...
